channel.title: Registering My Server
channel.description: When i go to register my server it says Cameron blah blah needs to be online to register.I cant get it to work no matter what :eek:Please help me with this and also do i need the program from no-ip.com?1 more thing.Will servers work on dial up(thats where u have to dial to get online)? Cheers, Camerona30 :P Going to bed be on in the morning ;)

item.title: Registering My Server
item.dc:creator: @Mod_faggot Mod faggot
item.description:
@Mod_faggot wrote:

[quote=“camerona30, post:1, topic:102177”]When i go to register my server it says Cameron blah blah needs to be online to register.I cant get it to work no matter what :eek:Please help me with this and also do i need the program from no-ip.com?1 more thing.Will servers work on dial up(thats where u have to dial to get online)?
Cheers,
Camerona30
Going to bed be on in the morning ;)[/quote]

Http://www.no-ip.com

Just register and follow a no-ip tutorial, stickied in rsc development (still works for rs2 servers)

Dial up can host servers, it will just be slow as all hell. I’d advise you to get a hoster

Read full topic

item.title: Registering My Server
item.dc:creator: @ffixmaster ffixmaster
item.description:
@ffixmaster wrote:

u dont need to download anyhing for no-ip and i think it shud work with dial up but it would be slower and lag more

Read full topic
